Powered by the Qualcomm SM8650-AB Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset and 16GB of RAM, this phone offers smooth performance. The device comes with a triple main camera setup, including a 50MP wide, 64MP periscope telephoto, and 50MP ultrawide lens, capable of recording 8K videos. It also features a 16MP selfie camera. The phone is equipped with a 5100mAh Li-Po battery and supports 120W wired, 50W wireless, and 10W reverse wireless charging. Additionally, it offers IP68 dust/water resistance and comes in black, red, and white colors. With its premium build and top-notch specifications, the iQOO 12 Pro is a compelling option for smartphone enthusiasts.

It runs on Android 13, upgradeable to Android 14, and is powered by the Qualcomm SM6375 Snapdragon 695 5G chipset. The phone comes with either 6GB or 8GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, which is expandable via microSDXC. The main camera features a triple setup with 48MP, 8MP telephoto, and 8MP ultrawide lenses, while the selfie camera has an 8MP sensor. The device also boasts a 5000mAh non-removable battery with wired PD and QC charging. Additionally, it includes features such as a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, IP65/IP68 dust/water resistance, and stereo speakers. The Sony Xperia 10 V is available in black, white, sage green, and lavender, and is priced at €274.55 / $349.99 / £269.99.

Powered by the Android 11 operating system and a Mediatek MT6853 Dimensity 800U chipset, the Hard Case G5 also comes with 128GB of internal storage and 6GB of RAM. Other notable features include IP69 dust/water resistance, drop-to-concrete resistance, and NFC capability. Available in black, the Energizer Hard Case G5 is a reliable and versatile option for those in need of a sturdy smartphone.

It features a monochrome graphic display with a resolution of 4 x 16 chars and is equipped with a removable Li-Ion 650 mAh battery that provides a standby time of 70 hours and talk time of 3 hours. The phone has a Mini-SIM card slot and a phonebook capacity of 100 entries, with support for SMS messaging. It also comes in 3 different colors and has a compact body with dimensions of 112 x 50 x 17 mm and a weight of 99 grams. The Bosch 909 Dual does not have a camera, loudspeaker, Bluetooth, or radio, and it does not support GPRS or EDGE technology. Additionally, it does not have a 3.5mm jack or a card slot for memory expansion.

The phone comes with 96MB RAM and 192MB ROM, expandable via a microSD card slot. It has a 2MP main camera with autofocus and video recording capabilities, as well as a videocall camera for selfies. The device supports GSM and HSPA networks, with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity options. It is powered by a removable 1500mAh Li-Ion battery, providing up to 250 hours of standby time and up to 4 hours of talk time. The UBiQUiO 503g is available in black and gray color options and is equipped with a QWERTY keyboard for easy typing.

It is powered by the Apple A16 Bionic chipset and runs on iOS 17. The phone comes with a dual main camera setup, featuring a 48 MP wide lens and a 12 MP ultrawide lens, as well as a 12 MP selfie camera. The device is equipped with a non-removable Li-Ion 3349 mAh battery and supports fast wired and wireless charging. Additionally, it offers a range of connectivity options including Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and NFC. The iPhone 15 is available in various colors and comes with 6GB of RAM and internal storage options of 128GB, 256GB, or 512GB. With its sleek design and advanced features, the iPhone 15 is a versatile and high-performing smartphone suitable for a wide range of users.

The Kyocera DuraForce Pro 2 also features a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, stereo speakers, and a 3.5mm headphone jack, offering a comprehensive set of features for users in need of a durable and reliable smartphone.
